goal: Enable category filtering on the blog listing page using the existing category query parameter.
acceptance_criteria: Read the category query parameter via searchParams in app/blog/page.tsx
Filter posts with getPostsByCategory when a valid category is selected
All Posts shows all posts when no category is selected
Unit tests cover category filtering behavior
approach: Update BlogPage to accept searchParams and resolve the selected category
Load categories first, validate the selected category against the known set, and filter posts accordingly
Apply conditional styles to category links for the active category
Extend existing BlogPage tests to assert filtering and active state
risks: Invalid category query values could lead to empty results
Changing the BlogPage signature could break existing tests
rollback_plan: Revert the BlogPage searchParams changes and the associated tests.
